name: Arrowhead (Bojarzin)
description:
Arrowhead!

I made a project for a game jam not too long ago where the key mechanic was diving forward, a la Hat in Time. I thought more about doing that type of motion but with a charge, and thought of the flight of an arrow. That also made me think of sticking into sideways platforms, rather than jumping onto one, and that's where the concept spawned.

You can collect all the gems, though that functionally changes nothing, and there's nothing else to do! :D

Bug: you're able to abuse momentum by charging dash on the ground, then releasing and jumping at the same time, as well as drastically lowered gravity and getting a massive boost in height. Oops
